book.synopsis: With greatly expanded text, this is the most revealing and frank personal 30-year chronicle of the group ever written. Insider Barry Miles covers the Beatles story from childhood to the break-up of the group.
book.title_long: The Beatles Diary, Vol. 1: The Beatles Years
